name: GoodEarthTea
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good earth tea
Developer Terms of Use
des: With the power of your voice, explore the sunshine, creativity, laughter, positivity, and the world of Good Earth Tea on Alexa to elevate your tea experience. In the mood for a cup of freshly brewed herbal tea or perhaps a green tea over ice? Just ask Good Earth Tea for a DIY recipe. Wish to venture into the unknown? Share your mood with Good Earth Tea and we will recommend a brew of goodness from our Sensorial Blends, Sweet & Spicy, or Ayurvedic range of teas. If brewing a cup of tea is not enough, then we have it covered with some tea tales, trending US travel destinations, and stories of where your tea comes from and what makes it so very special. What more, you ask? Well, you can also listen to a few blogs or get your queries answered about your favorite tea, its origins, and even nutritional facts. Since we are on a mission to thank nature for all its tongue-tingling flavors, you get to experience it all while preserving the world one cup at a time, how cool is that? So, let’s get to it, say ‘Alexa, Open Good Earth Tea’ and begin your tea adventure! Born in the early 70s, a trailblazer, one of America’s first Herbal Teas, and inspired by sunny Santa Cruz, Good Earth Tea is on a mission to brighten any day with our bold brews and journey to preserve the planet with our sustainable processes and packaging. Packed with creativity, excitement, and positivity, Good Earth Teas are anything but normal. Breathe, sip, be bold, and repeat. All of our Sensorial Blends are Rainforest Alliance certified which means we aim to keep everyone in the ecosystem, happy. And we are part of the Ethical Tea Partnership to create a fairer, better, more sustainable tea industry for workers, farmers and the environment. Now go ahead and brew a Good Earth cup of tea because we know you were born to be bold.
